dtliExcerpt: This is a show that makes you feel like you're at a party, not watching one – and what a party it is, with caviar and champagne and snow falling from the ceiling.
bwwExcerpt: I say all this with both awe and revulsion. There may in fact be value in distraction at this moment in our history, and rarely has distraction looked as lovely. The scenic designer Mimi Lien's nearly complete redesign of the aptly chosen Imperial Theatre begins as you enter its formerly pink-marble...
